org.apache.lenya.cms.publication
Class Label

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.Label
public class Label
extends java.lang.Object

The Label class encapsulates a string label and a associated language.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
Author:
Christian Egli
